about.title: About Me
about.content:
I am a fourth-year student of Systems Engineering at the National Technological University.

From a very young age, I was passionate about programming. I started exploring C# to create my own video games, which introduced me to the world of software development.

Today, I apply Java, JavaScript, React, and Spring Boot to create scalable and efficient solutions, always following best practices and design patterns.

items.description: I led a software development project using agile methodologies, organizing the project structure and performing code reviews. I coordinated a cross-functional team (backend, frontend, scrum master, and agile delivery manager) to create a web app that facilitates the offering, hiring, and evaluation of services.

items.title: Heroes App
items.description: Explore DC and Marvel heroes with their alter egos, first appearances, and publishers on a visual and interactive platform.

items.title: Weather App
items.description: Check the weather of any city with accurate and real-time data in a modern and simple interface.

items.title: ToDo List
items.description: Organize your daily tasks efficiently with an intuitive application for adding, deleting, and managing to-dos.

items.title: E-commerce
items.description: Upload, edit, and delete products easily with a search bar and organized categories to explore the catalog.

items.title: Rick and Morty API
items.description: Discover and filter Rick and Morty characters with an interactive card design and efficient pagination.
